atk-s0101a:223_12: viya ca kusalakammassa arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento –
atk-s0101a:224_3: ‘Eva’nti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsamāno –
atk-s0101a:224_7: “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a:224_8: Tadubhayenāpi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti.
atk-s0101a:224_9: Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti,
atk-s0101a:224_10: tasmā ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ ayaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0101a:225_0: “Evaṃ me suta”nti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati.
atk-s0101a:225_5: tasseva bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0101a:226_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto –
atk-s0101a:226_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyino
atk-s0101a:226_2: sīhanādanādino sabbasattuttamassa dhammissarassa dhammarājassa dhammādhipatino dhammadīpassa dhammasaraṇassa
atk-s0101a:226_4: na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kātabbā”ti sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0101a:231_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0101a:232_1: “appevanāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-s0101a:232_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo.
atk-s0101a:232_10: bhaddāli nāma bhikkhu satthusāsane sikkhāya aparipūrakārī’ti.
atk-s0101a:232_14: “Tena kho pana samayena uggahamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
atk-s0101a:233_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0101a:235_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0101a:235_5: mapacchimayāmamuhuttādīsu kālappabhedabhūtesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a:236_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a:236_1: sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya.
atk-s0101a:236_3: “evaṃ me sutaṃ” asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge vāti
atk-s0101a:236_4: evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā,
atk-s0101a:236_6: tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0101a:236_16: evamādayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā.
atk-s0101a:236_17: Tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0101a:236_21: tesupi samayesu aññataraṃ samayaṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0101a:237_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca,
atk-s0101a:237_4: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacananiddeso kato,
atk-s0101a:237_8: Tattha tathā idha ca aññathā atthasambhavato.
atk-s0101a:237_9: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvena bhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0101a:237_12: tattha tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati,
atk-s0101a:238_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0101a:238_1: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0101a:238_2: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi,
atk-s0101a:238_3: tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha karaṇavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0101a:239_0: Idha pana aññasmiñca evaṃ jātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati.
atk-s0101a:239_1: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi,
atk-s0101a:242_0: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0101a:243_6: Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi “ekasmiṃ samaye”ti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:246_0: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0101a:250_0: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthāraattho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:251_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammakāyaṃ paccakkhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0101a:251_2: ayaṃ vo satthā”ti satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti.
atk-s0101a:252_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0101a:252_1: Tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasaṅghāta samānakāyo sopi bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0101a:252_2: kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti,
atk-s0101a:254_0: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti antarā-
atk-s0101a:254_3: “janā saṅgamma mantenti mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu hi kāraṇe antarā- saddo.
atk-s0101a:254_5: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0101a:254_10: tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0101a:254_12: tasmā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca vivareti evametthattho veditabbo. Antarā-
atk-s0101a:254_14: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
atk-s0101a:255_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotīti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0101a:255_2: Addhānagamanasamayassa hi vibhaṅge “aḍḍhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato aḍḍhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
atk-s0101a:256_2: So hi bhikkhusaṅgho guṇehipi mahā ahosi,
atk-s0101a:257_2: tasmā yathā “bhojane mattaññū”ti vutte “bhojane mattaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a:258_0: Suppiyopi kho paribbājakoti suppiyoti tassa nāmaṃ. Pi-
atk-s0101a:263_6: ajja pariyāyo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu”ntiādīsu hi vāre pariyāyasaddo vattati.
atk-s0101a:264_0: Buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti avaṇṇavirahitassa aparimāṇavaṇṇasamannāgatassāpi buddhassa bhagavato –
atk-s0101a:264_2: taṃ samaṇassa gotamassa natthi tasmā arasarūpo samaṇo gotamo, nibbhogo,
atk-s0101a:264_14: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇanti vatvā tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ dosaṃ nindaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:265_1: evaṃ dhammassāpi taṃ taṃ akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā –
atk-s0101a:266_1: evaṃ saṅghassāpi yaṃ vā taṃ vā akāraṇameva kāraṇato vatvā –
atk-s0101a:266_4: paccanīkapaṭipadaṃ ananulomapaṭipadaṃ adhammānulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno”ti tathā tathā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:267_7: pabhinnamadaṃ caṇḍahatthiṃ hatthena gaṇhanto viya ca vaṇṇārahasseva ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsamāno anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0101a:267_8: Ācariye kho pana gūthaṃ vā aggiṃ vā kaṇṭakaṃ vā kaṇhasappaṃ vā akkamante,
atk-s0101a:267_14: Kammassakā hi sattā attano kammānurūpameva gatiṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0101a:267_23: Mayhañca ācariyo tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:267_25: Evaṃ yoniso ummujjitvā ācariyavādaṃ maddamāno sammākāraṇameva kāraṇato apadisanto anekapariyāyena tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitumāraddho,
atk-s0101a:267_28: “suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:269_0: “Na harāmi na bhañjāmi, ārā siṅghāmi vārijaṃ;
atk-s0101a:270_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, gandhatthenoti vuccatī”ti. –
atk-s0101a:271_7: Ayaṃ kira taṃ taṃ bhūtameva kāraṇaṃ apadisanto anekapariyāyena ratanattayassa guṇūpasañhitaṃ pasaṃsaṃ abhāsi. Tattha –
atk-s0101a:271_13: asamo asamasamo”tiādinā ca nayena buddhassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:271_17: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi nayehi dhammassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:271_21: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi pana nayehi saṅghassa vaṇṇo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:271_22: Pahontena pana dhammakathikena pañcanikāye navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassāni ogāhitvā buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇo pakāsetabbo.
atk-s0101a:271_23: Imasmiñhi ṭhāne buddhādīnaṃ guṇe pakāsento atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na sakkā vattuṃ.
atk-s0101a:271_24: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu dhammakathikassa thāmo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:271_25: Brahmadatto pana māṇavo anussavādimattasambandhitena attano thāmena ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:272_0: Itiha te ubho ācariyantevāsīti evaṃ te dve ācariyantevāsikā.
atk-s0101a:272_4: Ācariyena hi ratanattayassa avaṇṇe bhāsite antevāsī vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:272_6: itaro vaṇṇanti evaṃ ācariyo sāraphalake visarukkhaāṇiṃ ākoṭayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:272_7: Antevāsī pana suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayāya āṇiyā taṃ āṇiṃ paṭibāhayamāno viya punappunaṃ ratanattayassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:273_0: Bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti bhikkhusaṅghañcāti bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca pacchato
atk-s0101a:273_1: pacchato dassanaṃ avijahantā iriyāpathānubandhanena anubandhā honti,
atk-s0101a:274_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā taṃ addhānaṃ paṭipanno?
atk-s0101a:274_2: Kasmā ca so ratanattayassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti?
atk-s0101a:274_3: Bhagavā tāva tasmiṃ kāle rājagahaparivattakesu aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu aññatarasmiṃ vasitvā pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0101a:274_4: katvā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahe piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0101a:274_5: So taṃ divasaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0101a:274_8: Suppiyopi kho tasmiṃ kāle rājagahaparivattake aññatarasmiṃ paribbājakārāme vasitvā paribbājakaparivuto rājagahe bhikkhāya carati.
atk-s0101a:274_9: Sopi taṃ divasaṃ paribbājakaparisāya sulabhabhikkhaṃ katvā bhuttapātarāso paribbājake paribbājakaparikkhāraṃ gāhāpetvā –
atk-s0101a:274_10: nāḷandaṃ gamissāmicceva bhagavato taṃ maggaṃ paṭipannabhāvaṃ ajānantova anubandho.
atk-s0101a:274_12: So ajānitvāva gacchanto gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā olokayamāno bhagavantaṃ addasa buddhasiriyā sobhamānaṃ rattakambalaparikkhittamiva jaṅgamakanakagirisikharaṃ.
atk-s0101a:275_0: Tasmiṃ kira samaye dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhamitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo samantā asītihatthappamāṇe padese
atk-s0101a:276_0: Asīti anubyañjanānurañjitañca pana bhagavato sarīraṃ vikasitakamaluppalamiva,
atk-s0101a:276_4: byāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsinī cassa dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇamālā ganthetvā ṭhapitadvattiṃsacandamālāya dvattiṃsasūriyamālāya
atk-s0101a:276_6: Tañca pana bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū sabbeva appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā asaṃsaṭṭhā codakā
atk-s0101a:276_8: Tesaṃ majjhe bhagavā rattakambalapākāraparikkhitto viya kañcanathambho,
atk-s0101a:276_11: tārāgaṇaparivārito viya puṇṇacando migapakkhīnampi cakkhūni pīṇayati,
atk-s0101a:276_13: Tasmiñca pana divase yebhuyyena asītimahātherā meghavaṇṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ ādāya
atk-s0101a:276_14: suvammavammitā viya gandhahatthino vigatadosā vantadosā bhinnakilesā vijaṭitajaṭā chinnabandhanā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0101a:276_29: aparimitakālasañcitapuññabalanibbattāya acinteyyāya anopamāya buddhalīlāya cando viya gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0101a:277_0: Athevaṃ bhagavantaṃ anopamāya buddhalīlāya gacchantaṃ bhikkhū ca okkhittacakkhū santindriye santamānase
atk-s0101a:277_1: uparinabhe ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ viya bhagavantaṃyeva namassamāne disvāva paribbājako attano parisaṃ avalokesi.
atk-s0101a:277_4: asukassa pādā”ti evamādiniratthakavacanā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā adassanīyā apāsādikā.
atk-s0101a:278_0: Idāni tena bhagavato vaṇṇo vattabbo bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a:278_1: Yasmā panesa lābhasakkārahāniyā ceva pakkhahāniyā ca niccampi bhagavantaṃ usūyati.
atk-s0101a:278_6: Upatissakolitānañca sañjayassa santike pabbajitakāleyeva paribbājakā mahāparisā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0101a:278_7: tesu pana pakkantesu sāpi tesaṃ parisā bhinnā.
atk-s0101a:278_8: Iti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi ayaṃ paribbājako yasmā niccampi bhagavantaṃ usūyati,
atk-s0101a:278_9: tasmā taṃ usūyavisuggāraṃ uggiranto ratanattayassa avaṇṇameva bhāsatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:279_1: Atha kho bhagavā ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenāti bhagavā
atk-s0101a:279_2: tāya buddhalīlāya gacchamāno anupubbena ambalaṭṭhikādvāraṃ pāpuṇitvā sūriyaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0101a:279_4: atthasamīpaṃ gato sūriyo”ti ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0101a:280_3: Tassa avidūre bhavattā uyyānampi ambalaṭṭhikā tveva saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0101a:280_4: Taṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ suyojitadvāraṃ mañjusā viya suguttaṃ.
atk-s0101a:280_5: Tattha rañño kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicittaṃ agāraṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0101a:281_0: Suppiyopi khoti suppiyopi tasmiṃ ṭhāne sūriyaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0101a:281_3: bahuparissayo ca ayaṃ maggo corehipi vāḷayakkhehipi vāḷamigehipi.
atk-s0101a:281_4: Ayaṃ kho pana samaṇo gotamo uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0101a:281_5: samaṇassa ca gotamassa vasanaṭṭhāne devatā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0101a:281_6: handāhampi idha ekarattivāsaṃ upagantvā sveva gamissāmī”ti tadevuyyānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0101a:281_7: Tato bhikkhusaṅgho bhagavato vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-s0101a:281_8: Paribbājakopi uyyānassa ekapasse paribbājakaparikkhāre otāretvā vāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ attano parisāya.
atk-s0101a:282_0: Evaṃ vāsaṃ upagato pana so paribbājako rattibhāge dasabalaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0101a:282_1: Tasmiñca samaye samantā vippakiṇṇatārakā viya padīpā jalanti,
atk-s0101a:282_4: Tattha ekabhikkhussapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddo vā khipitasaddo vā natthi.
atk-s0101a:282_5: Sā hi parisā attano ca sikkhitasikkhatāya satthari ca gāravenāti dvīhi kāraṇehi nivāte padīpasikhā viya niccalā sannisinnāva ahosi.
atk-s0101a:282_6: Paribbājako taṃ vibhūtiṃ disvā attano parisaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0101a:282_12: So ratanattayassa guṇavaṇṇe vattabbepi issāvasena puna avaṇṇameva ārabhi.
atk-s0101a:283_4: Suttantapariyāyena pana tayo tayova tato paṭṭhāya sambahulā.
atk-s0101a:283_6: Maṇḍalamāḷeti katthaci dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katā kūṭāgārasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0101a:283_7: katthaci ekaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā thambhapantiṃ parikkhipitvā katā upaṭṭhānasālāpi “maṇḍalamāḷo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0101a:283_16: Tattha andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0101a:283_23: Yāvañcidanti yāva ca idaṃ tena suppaṭividitatāya appameyyattaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0101a:284_2: Yo so bhagavā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0101a:284_3: tena bhagavatā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayaṃ jānatā,
atk-s0101a:284_4: hatthatale ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya sabbañeyyadhammaṃ passatā.
atk-s0101a:285_2: Tīhi vijjāhi chahi vā pana abhiññāhi jānatā,
atk-s0101a:285_5: sabbasattānaṃ cakkhuvisayātītāni tirokuṭṭādigatānipi rūpāni ativisuddhena maṃsacakkhunā passatā.
atk-s0101a:286_1: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddhena antarāyikadhamme vā jānatā,
atk-s0101a:286_5: Evaṃ catūvesārajjavasena catūhākārehi thomitena sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā nānajjhāsayatā suppaṭividitā yāva ca suṭṭhu paṭividitā.
atk-s0101a:287_1: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti yā ca ayaṃ bhagavatā “dhātuso,
atk-s0101a:287_17: paccuppannaṃ addhānaṃ dhātusova sattā saṃsandanti samenti,
atk-s0101a:287_19: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatā,
atk-s0101a:287_24: nāḷiyā minantena viya tulāya tulayantena viya ca nānādhimuttikatāñāṇena sabbaññutaññāṇena viditā,
atk-s0101a:287_26: Dvepi nāma sattā ekajjhāsayā dullabhā lokasmiṃ.
atk-s0101a:287_29: Imesu cāpi dvīsu ācariyantevāsīsu ayañhi “suppiyo paribbājako…pe…
atk-s0101a:287_30: bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhā honti bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
atk-s0101a:288_1: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ saṅkhiyadhammaṃ viditvāti ettha viditvāti sabbaññutaññāṇena jānitvā.
atk-s0101a:288_2: Bhagavā hi katthaci maṃsacakkhunā disvā jānāti –
atk-s0101a:288_3: “addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a:288_5: “addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tā devatāyo sahassasseva pāṭaligāme vatthūni parigaṇhantiyo”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a:288_7: “assosi kho bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa subhaddena paribbājakena saddhiṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpa”ntiādīsu viya.
atk-s0101a:288_9: “assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya sandhānassa gahapatissa nigrodhena
atk-s0101a:288_16: Tattha niratthakakiccaṃ bhagavatā bodhipallaṅkeyeva arahattamaggena samugghātaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0101a:290_0: Bhagavā hi pātova uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0101a:290_2: bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya kadāci ekako,
atk-s0101a:290_4: gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati;
atk-s0101a:290_8: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatavātā pathaviṃ sodhenti,
atk-s0101a:290_9: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0101a:290_10: apare vātā pupphāni upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti,
atk-s0101a:290_15: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni
atk-s0101a:290_16: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni alaṅkarontiyo ito cito ca dhāvanti,
atk-s0101a:290_17: hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a:290_18: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni.
atk-s0101a:290_21: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0101a:290_25: sataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññapetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti.
atk-s0101a:290_26: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ sattānaṃ cittasantānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0101a:290_31: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a:290_34: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0101a:291_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0101a:291_10: Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0101a:291_16: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0101a:291_17: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0101a:291_18: Atha samassāsitakāyo vuṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0101a:291_19: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0101a:291_20: sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0101a:291_21: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a:292_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0101a:292_1: buddhāsanā vuṭṭhāya nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0101a:292_3: Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā tattha gantvā nisīdati ekakova muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno,
atk-s0101a:292_4: atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0101a:292_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a:293_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0101a:293_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti,
atk-s0101a:293_3: Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a:294_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāya pīḷitassa sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti.
atk-s0101a:294_1: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0101a:294_2: Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0101a:295_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase bhagavā purebhattakiccaṃ rājagahe pariyosāpetvā pacchābhatte maggaṃ āgato,
atk-s0101a:295_3: pacchimayāme caṅkamaṃ āruyha caṅkamamāno pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ imaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ kathaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇeneva sutvā aññāsīti.
atk-s0101a:296_1: “ime bhikkhū mayhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0101a:296_4: Mayi pana gate ete attano kathaṃ nirantaraṃ ārocessanti,
atk-s0101a:296_5: tato nesaṃ ahaṃ taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā tividhaṃ sīlaṃ vibhajanto,
atk-s0101a:296_8: sineruṃ ukkhipento viya suvaṇṇakūṭena nabhaṃ paharanto viya ca dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ brahmajālasuttantaṃ
atk-s0101a:296_10: sā me desanā parinibbutassāpi pañcavassasahassāni sattānaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ sampāpikā bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0101a:297_0: Paññatte āsane nisīdīti buddhakāle kira yattha yattha ekopi bhikkhu viharati sabbattha buddhāsanaṃ paññattameva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a:297_1: Bhagavā kira attano santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā phāsukaṭṭhāne viharante manasi karoti –
atk-s0101a:297_3: sakkhissati nu kho visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ no vā”ti.
atk-s0101a:297_4: Atha naṃ passati kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā akusalavitakkaṃ vitakkayamānaṃ,
atk-s0101a:297_5: tato “kathañhi nāma mādisassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharantaṃ imaṃ kulaputtaṃ akusalavitakkā
atk-s0101a:297_6: abhibhavitvā anamatagge vaṭṭadukkhe saṃsāressantī”ti tassa anuggahatthaṃ tattheva attānaṃ dassetvā taṃ
atk-s0101a:297_7: kulaputtaṃ ovaditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā puna attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0101a:297_9: “satthā amhākaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā amhākaṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃyeva attānaṃ dasseti”.
atk-s0101a:297_17: so mañcaṃ vā phalakaṃ vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā pāsāṇaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ vā paññapeti.
atk-s0101a:297_18: Taṃ alabhamānā purāṇapaṇṇānipi saṅkaḍḍhitvā tattha paṃsukūlaṃ pattharitvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a:297_20: taṃ papphoṭetvā paññapetvā parivāretvā te bhikkhū bhagavato adhimuttikañāṇamārabbha guṇaṃ thomayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0101a:298_0: Evaṃ nisinno pana jānantoyeva kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ bhikkhū pucchi.
atk-s0101a:298_4: Tattha kāya nutthāti katamāya nu kathāya sannisinnā bhavathāti attho.
atk-s0101a:298_6: tassā katamāya nu etthāti attho kāya notthātipi pāḷi.
atk-s0101a:299_6: ahaṃ pana sabbaññutāya tumhākaṃ kathaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā matthakappattaṃ katvā dassāmīti āgato”ti nisajjeva sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti.
atk-s0101a:299_10: Ayaṃ bhante amhākaṃ bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ārabbha guṇakathā vippakatā,
atk-s0101a:300_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādhurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā sukhāvataraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a:300_6: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhaguṇānubhāvasaṃsūcakassa imassa suttassa sukhāvagahaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0101a:301_3: pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyu”ntiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa vaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0101a:301_5: Yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0101a:302_0: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva kathesi;
atk-s0101a:303_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācaniyā dhammā;
atk-s0101a:303_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti;
atk-s0101a:303_2: evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca avekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni;
atk-s0101a:304_10: “Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0101a:304_11: Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni,
atk-s0101a:305_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni,
atk-s0101a:306_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa aṭṭhuppattiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0101a:306_6: Iti imaṃ vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā desanākusalo bhagavā –
atk-s0101a:307_0: Na āghātotiādīhi kiñcāpi tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āghātoyeva natthi,
atk-s0101a:307_1: atha kho āyatiṃ kulaputtānaṃ īdisesupi ṭhānesu akusaluppattiṃ paṭisedhento dhammanettiṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0101a:307_4: Appatītā honti tena atuṭṭhā asomanassikāti appaccayo;
atk-s0101a:307_6: Neva attano na paresaṃ hitaṃ abhirādhayatīti anabhiraddhi;
atk-s0101a:307_10: Tesaṃ vasena sesānampi sampayuttadhammānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭikkhittameva.
atk-s0101a:308_1: dutiyena nayena tattha ādīnavaṃ dassento āha –
atk-s0101a:308_2: “tatra ce tumhe assatha kupitā vā anattamanā vā,
atk-s0101a:308_4: Tattha ‘tatra ce tumhe assathā’ti tesu avaṇṇabhāsakesu,
atk-s0101a:308_5: tasmiṃ vā avaṇṇe tumhe bhaveyyātha ce;
atk-s0101a:308_9: ‘Tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyo’ti tumhākaṃyeva tena kopena,
atk-s0101a:308_10: tāya ca anattamanatāya paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyya.
atk-s0101a:309_6: na paccatthikānaṃ subhāsitadubbhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānāti. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a:310_0: “Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a:311_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a:314_0: Evaṃ sabbathāpi avaṇṇe manopadosaṃ nisedhetvā idāni paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a:315_8: saṅgho duppaṭipanno”tiādīni sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:315_30: goṇosī”tiādinā pana nayena dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantaṃ puggalaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā adhivāsanakhantiyeva tattha kātabbā.
atk-s0101a:316_1: Evaṃ avaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ tādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni vaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ dassetuṃ “mamaṃ vā,
atk-s0101a:316_4: Tattha pareti ye keci pasannā devamanussā.
atk-s0101a:317_3: Idhāpi tumhaṃ yevassa tena antarāyoti tena uppilāvitattena tumhākaṃyeva paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ antarāyo bhaveyyāti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:319_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a:320_0: Dhammoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a:321_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassa.
atk-s0101a:322_0: Saṅghoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
atk-s0101a:323_0: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenāpi jambudīpassā”ti ca.
atk-s0101a:324_3: agge te pasannā”ti ca evamādīhi anekasatehi suttehi ratanattaye pītisomanassameva vaṇṇitanti.
atk-s0101a:324_7: amhākaṃ dhammo”tiādinā nayena āyasmato channassa uppannasadisaṃ gehassitaṃ pītisomanassaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0101a:324_9: Tenevāyasmā channopi yāva buddho na parinibbāyi,
atk-s0101a:324_11: parinibbānakāle paññattena pana brahmadaṇḍena tajjito taṃ pītisomanassaṃ pahāya visesaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0101a:324_12: Tasmā antarāyakaraṃyeva sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:325_0: “Luddho atthaṃ na jānāti, luddho dhammaṃ na passati;
atk-s0101a:326_0: Andhaṃ tamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ lobho sahate naraṃ.
atk-s0101a:329_0: Tatiyavāro pana idha anāgatopi atthato āgato yevāti veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:330_3: saṅgho suppaṭipanno”tiādīni sutvā na tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:332_3: Idaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi padehi ābaddhaṃ vaṇṇena ca avaṇṇena ca.
atk-s0101a:332_9: So pana duvidho brahmadattena bhāsitavaṇṇo ca bhikkhusaṅghena acchariyaṃ āvusotiādinā nayena āraddhavaṇṇo ca.
atk-s0101a:332_10: Tesu bhikkhusaṅghena vuttavaṇṇassa upari suññatāpakāsane anusandhiṃ dassessati.
atk-s0101a:332_11: Idha pana brahmadattena vuttavaṇṇassa anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “appamattakaṃ kho panetaṃ,
atk-s0101a:333_9: oramattakaṃ sīlamattakaṃ’ nāma yena “tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadāmī”ti ussāhaṃ katvāpi vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno puthujjano vadeyyāti.
atk-s0101a:333_11: nanu idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma yogino aggavibhūsanaṃ?
atk-s0101a:336_0: Bhagavatāpi ca anekesu suttasatesu sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ. Yathāha –

atk-s0101a:345_0: Candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpi, uppalaṃ atha vassikī;
atk-s0101a:348_0: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo.
atk-s0101a:350_0: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti ca. ;
atk-s0101a:351_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
atk-s0101a:352_0: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti ca. ;
atk-s0101a:353_2: ye keci bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0101a:353_5: evamete bījagāmabhūtagāmā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0101a:353_8: bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya sattabojjhaṅge bhāvento sattabojjhaṅge bahulīkaronto vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti dhammesū”ti ca.
atk-s0101a:353_10: Evamanekesu suttasatesu sīlaṃ mahantameva katvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0101a:353_15: tasmā uparimaṃ upanidhāya heṭṭhimaṃ oramattakaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0101a:353_17: Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthinagara –
atk-s0101a:353_18: dvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle dvādasayojane ratanamaṇḍape yojanappamāṇe ratanapallaṅke nisīditvā tiyojanike
atk-s0101a:353_19: dibbasetacchatte dhāriyamāne dvādasayojanāya parisāya attādānaparidīpanaṃ titthiyamaddanaṃ –
atk-s0101a:353_25: Tassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīrato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmiyo uggantvā yāva bhavaggā gacchanti,
atk-s0101a:353_27: dutiyā dutiyā rasmiyo purimāya purimāya yamakayamakā viya ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti.
atk-s0101a:354_0: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a:354_1: Buddhānaṃ pana bhagavantānaṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsassa lahukatāya pañcahākārehi āciṇṇavasitāya ca,
atk-s0101a:354_3: Tassā tassā pana rasmiyā āvajjanaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni visuṃ visuṃyeva.
atk-s0101a:355_6: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappetīti sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:356_0: Yaṃ pana bhagavā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā,
atk-s0101a:356_1: ekūnatiṃsavassakāle cakkavattisirīnivāsabhūtā bhavanā nikkhamma anomānadītīre pabbajitvā,
atk-s0101a:356_3: visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ uruvelagāme sujātāya dinnaṃ pakkhittadibbojaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā,
atk-s0101a:356_4: sāyanhasamaye dakkhiṇuttarena bodhimaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā assatthadumarājānaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0101a:356_9: cuddasahatthapallaṅkavaragato suvaṇṇapīṭhe ṭhapitaṃ rajatakkhandhaṃ viya paññāsahatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā,
atk-s0101a:356_18: maggapaṭipāṭiyā adhigatena catutthamaggena sabbakilese khepetvā sabbabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhi,
atk-s0101a:357_0: Tattha yathā hatthe udakaṃ pātiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_1: pātiyaṃ udakaṃ ghaṭe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_2: ghaṭe udakaṃ kolambe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_3: kolambe udakaṃ cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_4: cāṭiyaṃ udakaṃ mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_5: mahākumbhiyaṃ udakaṃ kusobbhe udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_6: kusobbhe udakaṃ kandare udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_7: kandare udakaṃ kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_8: kunnadiyaṃ udakaṃ pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_9: pañcamahānadiyaṃ udakaṃ cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0101a:357_10: cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ sinerupādake mahāsamudde udakaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0101a:357_11: Pātiyaṃ udakaṃ upanidhāya hatthe udakaṃ parittaṃ…pe…
atk-s0101a:357_12: sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ upanidhāya cakkavāḷamahāsamudde udakaṃ parittaṃ.
atk-s0101a:357_13: Iti uparūpari udakaṃ bahukaṃ upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā udakaṃ parittaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a:358_0: Evameva upari upari guṇe upādāya heṭṭhā heṭṭhā sīlaṃ appamattakaṃ oramattakanti veditabbaṃ. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a:365_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a:366_8: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gathitā mucchitā ajjhopannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0101a:366_9: puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti.
atk-s0101a:366_10: Puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0101a:366_11: puthuvāyaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhyaṃ gato visaṃsaṭṭho sīlasutādiguṇayuttehi ariyehi janehīti puthujjanoti.
atk-s0101a:368_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0101a:368_27: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato,
atk-s0101a:374_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijāto vipassī bhagavā gato…pe… kassapo bhagavā gato.
atk-s0101a:375_1: So hi sampati jātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha –
atk-s0101a:375_3: bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
atk-s0101a:375_4: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā ca disā anuviloketi,
atk-s0101a:376_2: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0101a:379_0: “Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā”ti, ettha vuttacāmarukkhepo pana sabbatitthiyanimmaddanassa.
atk-s0101a:394_2: ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato,
atk-s0101a:394_6: dhammavavatthānena vicikicchaṃ pahāya ñāṇena avijjaṃ padāletvā,
atk-s0101a:396_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato?Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ.
atk-s0101a:407_0: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedanalakkhaṇaṃ. Anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a:408_9: Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a:409_9: tasmā tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a:410_0: Api ca jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…,
atk-s0101a:410_4: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho.
atk-s0101a:410_6: tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0101a:411_2: sadevamanussāya pajāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0101a:411_5: tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā.
atk-s0101a:411_7: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0101a:411_8: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0101a:411_10: Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthaṃ āgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0101a:411_14: sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0101a:411_20: Tattha tathadassī atthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:412_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0101a:412_2: yañca rattiṃ yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0101a:412_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ – suttaṃ,
atk-s0101a:412_5: taṃ sabbaṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a:412_14: tathameva hoti avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0101a:412_17: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0101a:413_4: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0101a:415_1: Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi,
atk-s0101a:415_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanenapi na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi;
atk-s0101a:415_3: atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājātirājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tenāha –
atk-s0101a:415_6: sadevamanussāya pajāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī,
atk-s0101a:416_4: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0101a:416_5: Iti sabbālokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti. Da-
atk-s0101a:418_0: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a:418_1: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a:418_2: Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a:418_3: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0101a:420_2: Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0101a:421_0: Katamañca taṃ bhikkhaveti yena appamattakena oramattakena sīlamattakena puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0101a:422_3: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhāvanāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0101a:423_3: tassa aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0101a:425_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti. Aniccaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0101a:427_0: Iti imāsu pañcasu pucchāsu adiṭṭhassa tāva kassaci dhammassa abhāvato tathāgatassa adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā natthi.
atk-s0101a:427_1: “Idaṃ nāma aññehi paṇḍitehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā desessāmī”ti samannāhārasseva anuppajjanato diṭṭhasaṃsandanā pucchāpi natthi.
atk-s0101a:427_2: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ ekadhammepi āsappanā parisappanā natthi,
atk-s0101a:427_5: Avasesā pana dve pucchā buddhānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0101a:428_0: 8. Idāni taṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchāya pucchitamatthaṃ kathetuṃ “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a:429_5: tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0101a:429_6: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a:429_12: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a:430_9: Imasmiṃ panatthe vitthāriyamāne ativiya papañco hoti,
atk-s0101a:430_12: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:431_1: Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova.
atk-s0101a:431_2: Natthi tassa vītikkamissāmīti cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā pageva kāyikāti imināva nayena aññesupi evarūpesu padesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:432_4: desanā pana ādito paṭṭhāya evaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0101a:432_5: atthaṃ pana dīpentena bhikkhusaṅghavasenāpi dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:433_0: Nihitadaṇḍo nihitasatthoti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍo ceva nikkhittasattho cāti attho.
atk-s0101a:433_1: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ viheṭhanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0101a:433_2: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā vāsiṃ pipphalikaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0101a:433_4: Tasmā nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0101a:434_4: Tāya dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakoti attho.
atk-s0101a:434_8: Vā saddo upari “adinnādānaṃ pahāyā”tiādīni apekkhitvā vikappattho vutto,
atk-s0101a:434_9: evaṃ sabbattha purimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā apekkhitvā vikappabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:435_2: puthujjano tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ vadamāno evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0101a:435_8: iti mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā vaṇṇaṃ vattukāmopi appamattakaṃ oramattakaṃ ācārasīlamattakameva vakkhati.
atk-s0101a:435_9: Upari asādhāraṇabhāvaṃ nissāya vaṇṇaṃ vattuṃ na sakkhissati.
atk-s0101a:435_10: Na kevalañca puthujjanova sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantopi paccekabuddhāpi na sakkontiyeva;
atk-s0101a:436_0: Adinnādānaṃ pahāyāti ettha adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ,
atk-s0101a:436_4: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo ca hoti.
atk-s0101a:436_10: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0101a:436_11: Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0101a:438_6: Athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attānaṃ katvā viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a:439_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-s0101a:440_1: Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo,
atk-s0101a:440_2: vā visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0101a:441_3: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0101a:442_0: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a:442_2: pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena –
atk-s0101a:442_3: “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0101a:442_4: adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0101a:443_6: So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādanakiriyākaraṇena daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0101a:443_7: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0101a:444_0: Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0101a:444_1: tathā “idamassa bhaṇāhī”ti āṇāpentopi paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi,
atk-s0101a:445_3: Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati,
atk-s0101a:445_5: tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati;
atk-s0101a:445_8: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahati yevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0101a:446_3: assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti,
atk-s0101a:446_6: asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti,
atk-s0101a:447_2: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti,
atk-s0101a:447_4: asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0101a:447_12: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0101a:448_0: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāyātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:449_0: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-s0101a:450_0: Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo.
atk-s0101a:451_0: Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi pisuṇavācādināmeva labhati, sā eva ca idhādhippetāti.
atk-s0101a:452_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
atk-s0101a:453_4: “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti piyakamyatā vā,
atk-s0101a:453_8: yesaṃ itoti vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ tesaṃ bhedāya.
atk-s0101a:454_0: Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ
atk-s0101a:454_1: upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni vatvā sandhānaṃ kattā anukattā.
atk-s0101a:454_4: “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti attho.
atk-s0101a:454_11: te pahāya aññattha gantumpi na icchatīti attho.
atk-s0101a:454_13: samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti,
atk-s0101a:455_2: eko kira dārako mātuvacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0101a:455_11: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya na pharusā vācā hoti.
atk-s0101a:455_12: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0101a:455_14: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0101a:455_15: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0101a:455_19: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusā vācā na hoti,
atk-s0101a:455_20: evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusā vācā na hoti.
atk-s0101a:455_22: “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusā vācā hoti,
atk-s0101a:456_7: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0101a:456_10: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī.
atk-s0101a:456_17: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0101a:456_18: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0101a:458_0: Kālena vadatīti kālavādī vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho.
atk-s0101a:458_1: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva vadatīti bhūtavādī.
atk-s0101a:458_3: Navalokuttaradhammasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti dhammavādī saṃvaravinayapahānavinayasannissitaṃ katvā vadatīti vinayavādī.
atk-s0101a:459_4: “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:459_8: Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo paññāyati,
atk-s0101a:459_10: Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0101a:459_11: Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati,
atk-s0101a:459_12: tena atthena sahitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0101a:459_13: na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a:460_1: Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhāti mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījanti pañcavidhassa bījagāmassa ceva,
atk-s0101a:460_2: yassa kassaci nīlatiṇarukkhādikassa bhūtagāmassa ca samārambhā,
atk-s0101a:461_3: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānopi ekabhattikova hoti.
atk-s0101a:462_2: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0101a:463_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇībhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:463_1: Attanā naccananaccāpanādivasena naccā ca gītā ca vāditā ca antamaso mayūranaccādivasenapi pavattānaṃ
atk-s0101a:463_3: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ na bhikkhunīnañca vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a:464_5: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-s0101a:464_7: Tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0101a:465_0: Uccāsayanaṃ vuccati pamāṇātikkantaṃ. Mahāsayananti akappiyapaccattharaṇaṃ. Tato viratoti attho.
atk-s0101a:467_4: Āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha aññatra odissa anuññātā āmakamaṃsamacchānaṃ paṭiggahaṇameva bhikkhūnaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:469_0: Dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇāti ettha dāsidāsavaseneva tesaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:469_2: ārāmikaṃ dammī”ti evaṃ vutte pana vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:470_1: Tattha khettaṃ nāma yasmiṃ pubbaṇṇaṃ ruhati.
atk-s0101a:471_1: gihīnaṃ pahitaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā gahetvā tattha tattha gamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:471_2: Pahiṇagamanaṃ vuccati gharā gharaṃ pesitassa khuddakagamanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:472_5: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a:472_7: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0101a:472_9: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a:472_11: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
atk-s0101a:473_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇe karoti,
atk-s0101a:473_3: tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ kulaṃ pavisitvā –
atk-s0101a:473_4: “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇathā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
atk-s0101a:473_7: “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
atk-s0101a:474_3: “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a:474_4: dadanto chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0101a:475_1: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0101a:475_2: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
atk-s0101a:476_1: Lañjaṃ alabhantā hi khettaṃ amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti.
atk-s0101a:477_0: Ukkoṭanādīsu ukkoṭananti assāmike sāmike kātuṃ lañjaggahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a:477_1: Vañcananti tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:477_3: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati,
atk-s0101a:477_8: migapotako eka”nti ca vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivatto –
atk-s0101a:477_11: migaṃ me dehī”ti āha. Tena hi –
atk-s0101a:477_14: mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti? “Āma, dinno”ti.
atk-s0101a:477_17: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0101a:477_18: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
atk-s0101a:477_19: Nikatīti yogavasena vā māyāvasena vā apāmaṅgaṃ pāmaṅganti,
atk-s0101a:477_28: Keci aññaṃ dassetvā aññassa parivattanaṃ sāciyogoti vadanti.
atk-s0101a:478_5: Yaṃ himapātasamaye himena paṭicchannā hutvā maggappaṭipannaṃ janaṃ musanti,
atk-s0101a:478_11: Gehaṃ pavisitvā manussānaṃ ure satthaṃ ṭhapetvā icchitabhaṇḍānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a:481_1: Idāni majjhimasīlaṃ vitthārento “yathā vā paneke bhonto”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a:481_3: Saddhādeyyānīti kammañca phalañca idhalokañca paralokañca saddahitvā dinnāni.
atk-s0101a:481_9: Evaṃ dinnāni hi na saddhādeyyāni nāma honti.
atk-s0101a:481_11: atthato pana saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā cīvarāni pārupitvā senāsanāni sevamānā gilānabhesajjaṃ paribhuñjamānāti sabbametaṃ vuttameva hoti.
atk-s0101a:482_8: Khandhabījaṃ nāma assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako,
atk-s0101a:483_4: Vinayavasena tāva yaṃ kiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju sannidhikārakaṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a:483_7: tehi laddhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā dutiyadivase bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:484_1: Tattha pānaṃ nāma ambapānādīni aṭṭha pānāni,
atk-s0101a:485_0: Vatthasannidhimhi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ sannidhi ca hoti,
atk-s0101a:485_5: Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0101a:485_7: so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato,
atk-s0101a:485_10: Cīvare pana appahonte satiyā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:485_11: Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ alābhena tato parampi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:485_12: “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:486_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ, ratho, sakaṭaṃ,
atk-s0101a:486_9: “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti hi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:487_2: eko divāṭhāneti ukkaṃsato dve mañcā vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a:487_3: Tato uttari labhitvā aññassa bhikkhuno vā gaṇassa vā dātabbo;
atk-s0101a:488_0: Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandhā vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0101a:488_1: Te gandhe āharāpetvā tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ dātabbā,
atk-s0101a:488_3: “Puna roge sati bhavissantī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:489_4: So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjitvā “sāmaṇera,
atk-s0101a:489_6: gaccha asukaṃ kulaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ vihāre nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi;
atk-s0101a:489_14: Atha sāmaṇeropi dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti,
atk-s0101a:490_4: Te hi ettakampi āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ alabhantā jīvitāpi voropeyyuṃ,
atk-s0101a:490_9: Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassāpi sannidhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a:490_10: Tathāgatassa pana taṇḍulanāḷiādīsu vā yaṃ kiñci caturatanamattaṃ vā pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ “idaṃ me ajja vā sve vā bhavissatī”ti ṭhapitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0101a:491_1: Visūkadassanesu naccaṃ nāma yaṃ kiñci naccaṃ,
atk-s0101a:491_2: taṃ maggaṃ gacchantenāpi gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:491_6: Ito parañhi ettakampi avatvā tattha tattha payojanamattameva vaṇṇayissāmāti.
atk-s0101a:493_1: ekaccesu kira janapadesu kālaṅkate ñātake na jhāpenti,
atk-s0101a:493_3: Atha nesaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ kāyaṃ ñatvā nīharitvā aṭṭhīni dhovitvā gandhehi makkhetvā ṭhapenti.
atk-s0101a:493_4: Te nakkhattakāle ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhīni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne surādīni ṭhapetvā rodantā paridevantā suraṃ pivanti.
atk-s0101a:493_8: tattha hoti annampi pānampi khajjampi bhojjampi leyyampi peyyampi naccampi gītampi vāditampi. Atthetaṃ,
atk-s0101a:493_11: Ekacce pana indajālena aṭṭhidhovanaṃ dhovanantipi vadanti.
atk-s0101a:494_0: Hatthiyuddhādīsu bhikkhuno neva hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ,
atk-s0101a:494_9: “tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīka”ntiādinā nayena vuttassa anīkassa dassanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:495_3: Ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti aṭṭhapadaṃ dasapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0101a:495_5: Parihārapathanti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha tattha pariharitabbaṃ,
atk-s0101a:495_8: Ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā sakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti ca,
atk-s0101a:495_14: Salākahatthanti lākhāya vā mañjiṭṭhikāya vā piṭṭhodakena vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā –
atk-s0101a:495_15: “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ paharitvā hatthiassādirūpadassanakīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:495_21: ākāse vā daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a:495_22: Ciṅgulikaṃ vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ.
atk-s0101a:495_27: Akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā akkharajānanakīḷā.
atk-s0101a:495_29: Yathāvajjaṃ nāma kāṇakuṇikhujjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ,
atk-s0101a:496_2: Anuyuttā viharantīti idaṃ apekkhitvā pana sabbapadesu upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0101a:496_19: Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ṭhapetvā tūlikaṃ sabbāneva gonakādīni ratanaparisibbitāni na vaṭṭantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a:497_0: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0101a:497_3: Ajinappaveṇīti ajinacammehi mañcappamāṇena sibbitvā katā paveṇī.
atk-s0101a:497_7: Taṃ kira setavatthassa upari kadalīmigacammaṃ pattharitvā sibbetvā karonti.
atk-s0101a:497_10: Setavitānampi heṭṭhā akappiyapaccattharaṇe sati na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:497_12: Ubhatolohitakūpadhānanti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti mañcassa ubhatolohitakaṃ upadhānaṃ,
atk-s0101a:497_14: Yaṃ pana ekameva upadhānaṃ ubhosu passesu rattaṃ vā hoti padumavaṇṇaṃ vā vicitraṃ vā,
atk-s0101a:497_19: Dātuṃ asakkonto mañce tiriyaṃ attharitvā upari paccattharaṇaṃ datvā nipajjitumpi labhati.
atk-s0101a:498_1: Ucchādanādīsu mātukucchito nikkhantadārakānaṃ sarīragandho dvādasavassapattakāle nassati,
atk-s0101a:498_4: Puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hatthapādaūrunābhiādīnaṃ saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ parimaddanti,
atk-s0101a:499_1: Sambāhananti mahāmallānaṃ viya hatthapāde muggarādīhi paharitvā bāhuvaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:499_2: Ādāsanti yaṃ kiñci ādāsaṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:499_6: Mukhacuṇṇaṃ mukhalepananti mukhe kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ haraṇatthāya mattikakakkaṃ denti,
atk-s0101a:499_10: tena chavivaṇṇe ārūḷhe mukhacuṇṇakena mukhaṃ cuṇṇenti,
atk-s0101a:500_1: taṃ vā aññaṃ vā sabbampi hatthābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:500_5: Apare catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana alaṅkatadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0101a:500_6: tathā itthipurisarūpādivicittaṃ bhesajjanāḷikaṃ suparikkhittaṃ vāmapasse olaggitaṃ;
atk-s0101a:500_10: keci ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthataṃ kesantaparicchedaṃ dassetvā meghamukhe vijjulataṃ viya nalāṭe uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ bandhanti,
atk-s0101a:501_2: Tattha rājānaṃ ārabbha mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃ mahānubhāvotiādinā nayena pavattā kathā rājakathā.
atk-s0101a:501_4: Tesu asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyotiādinā nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti.
atk-s0101a:501_5: Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ gatoti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0101a:501_7: meghamālo evaṃ mahānubhāvoti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca aho sūrāti gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā.
atk-s0101a:501_8: Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu asukena asuko evaṃ mārito,
atk-s0101a:501_10: Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatāti evaṃ pavattā pana sabbattha kammaṭṭhānameva hoti.
atk-s0101a:501_11: Api ca annādīsu evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha bhuñjimhāti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:501_12: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ sīlavantānaṃ adamha,
atk-s0101a:501_14: Ñātikathādīsu pana “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:501_15: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti vā “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:501_16: Gāmakathāpi suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhasubhikkhadubbhikkhādivasena vā “asukagāmavāsino sūrā samatthā”ti vā evaṃ assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:501_17: Sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā “khayavayaṃ gatā”ti vā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:502_0: Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca assādavasena na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0101a:502_1: saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:502_2: Sūrakathāpi ‘nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī’ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:502_3: Saddho ahosi khayaṃ gatoti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:502_4: Visikhākathāpi “asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā samatthā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:502_5: Saddhā pasannā khayavayaṃ gatāti evameva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0101a:503_3: sāpi “pāsādikā naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati;
atk-s0101a:504_0: Nānattakathāti purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā.
atk-s0101a:505_3: Khato meti hatthamuddāya sayaṃ niveditattā “samuddo”ti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhāyanakathā.
atk-s0101a:505_7: iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ vatvā pavattitakathā itibhavābhavakathā.
atk-s0101a:506_3: Tattha sahitaṃ meti mayhaṃ vacanaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ atthayuttaṃ kāraṇayuttanti attho.
atk-s0101a:506_4: Asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0101a:506_5: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīgharattāciṇṇavasena suppaguṇaṃ,

atk-s0101a:551_3: Tañca pajānanaṃ na parāmasatīti tañca evaṃvidhaṃ anuttaraṃ visesaṃ pajānantopi ahaṃ pajānāmīti taṇhādiṭṭhimānaparāmāsavasena tañca na parāmasati.
atk-s0101a:551_4: Aparāmasato cassa paccattaññeva nibbuti viditāti evaṃ aparāmasato cassa aparāmāsapaccayā sayameva attanāyeva tesaṃ parāmāsakilesānaṃ nibbuti viditā. Pākaṭaṃ,
atk-s0101a:552_0: Idāni yathāpaṭipannena tathāgatena sā nibbuti adhigatā,
atk-s0101a:552_1: taṃ paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ yāsu vedanāsu rattā titthiyā “idha sukhino bhavissāma,
atk-s0101a:552_3: tāsaṃyeva vedanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto vedanānaṃ samudayañcātiādimāha.
atk-s0101a:552_4: Tattha yathābhūtaṃ viditvāti “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a:552_5: taṇhāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a:552_6: kammasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a:552_7: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati.
atk-s0101a:552_8: Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ samudayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā;
atk-s0101a:552_10: taṇhānirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a:552_11: kammanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
atk-s0101a:552_12: phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati.
atk-s0101a:552_13: Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passatī”ti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ vasena vedanānaṃ atthaṅgamaṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a:552_15: ayaṃ vedanāya assādo”ti evaṃ assādañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a:552_17: ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo”ti evaṃ ādīnavañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā,
atk-s0101a:552_19: idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ viditvā vigatachandarāgatāya anupādāno anupādāvimutto,
atk-s0101a:552_24: tassa abhāvā kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvāva vimutto bhikkhave tathāgatoti.
atk-s0101a:553_2: bhikkhaveti ye te ahaṃ – “katame, ca te,
atk-s0101a:553_7: tañca tathāgato pajānāti tato ca uttaritaraṃ pajānātī”ti evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbaññutaññāṇadhammā gambhīrā duddasā…pe…
atk-s0101a:553_10: na sotāpannādīsu aññataro vaṇṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ vattuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0101a:553_11: atha kho tathāgatova yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti evaṃ pucchamānenāpi sabbaññutaññāṇameva puṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0101a:557_7: Yebhuyyenāti ye uparibrahmalokesu vā arūpesu vā nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a:557_14: subhaṭṭhāyino subhā vā manorammavatthābharaṇā hutvā tiṭṭhantīti subhaṭṭhāyino.
atk-s0101a:558_2: Suññaṃ brahmavimānanti pakatiyā nibbattasattānaṃ natthitāya suññaṃ,
atk-s0101a:558_4: Tassa kattā vā kāretā vā natthi,
atk-s0101a:558_5: visuddhimagge vuttanayena pana kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānā ratanabhūmi nibbattati.
atk-s0101a:558_7: Atha sattānaṃ pakatiyā vasitaṭṭhāne nikanti uppajjati,
atk-s0101a:558_10: Āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vāti ye uḷāraṃ puññakammaṃ katvā yattha katthaci appāyuke devaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a:558_11: te attano puññabalena ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0101a:558_12: tassa pana devalokassa āyuppamāṇeneva cavantīti āyukkhayā cavantīti vuccanti.
atk-s0101a:558_13: Ye pana parittaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā dīghāyukadevaloke nibbattanti,
atk-s0101a:558_16: Dīghamaddhānaṃ tiṭṭhatīti kappaṃ vā upaḍḍhakappaṃ vā.
atk-s0101a:559_9: Tattha “jātiṃ paṭicca bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso. Jaraṃ… byādhiṃ…
atk-s0101a:559_12: “Aho vata aññepi sattā itthattaṃ āgaccheyyu”nti ayaṃ taṇhātassanā nāma.
atk-s0101a:559_14: “Tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjantī”ti ayaṃ ñāṇatassanā nāma.
atk-s0101a:559_16: Brahmavimānanti idha pana paṭhamābhinibbattassa atthitāya suññanti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a:560_7: Issaro kattā nimmātāti ahaṃ loke issaro,
atk-s0101a:560_8: ahaṃ lokassa kattā ca nimmātā ca, pathavī –
atk-s0101a:560_13: Seṭṭho sajitāti ahaṃ lokassa uttamo ca sajitā ca,
atk-s0101a:560_18: goṇo hohī”ti “evaṃ sattānaṃ saṃvisajetā aha”nti maññati.
atk-s0101a:560_19: Vasī pitā bhūtabhabyānanti ahamasmi ciṇṇavasitāya vasī,
atk-s0101a:560_21: Tattha aṇḍajajalābujā sattā antoaṇḍakose ceva antovatthimhi ca bhabyā nāma,
atk-s0101a:560_27: Te sabbepi mayhaṃ puttāti saññāya “ahaṃ pitā bhūtabhabyāna”nti maññati.
atk-s0101a:561_1: “mayā ime sattā nimmitā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā “taṃ kissa hetū”tiādimāha.
atk-s0101a:561_4: Iminā mayanti attano kammavasena cutāpi upapannāpi ca kevalaṃ maññanāmatteneva “iminā mayaṃ nimmitā”ti
atk-s0101a:561_5: maññamānā vaṅkacchidde vaṅkaāṇī viya onamitvā tasseva pādamūlaṃ gacchantīti.
atk-s0101a:563_1: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetanti kāraṇaṃ kho panetaṃ.
atk-s0101a:563_2: So tato cavitvā aññatra na gacchati,
atk-s0101a:563_7: Pabbajjā hi yasmā agārassa hi taṃ kasigorakkhādikammaṃ tattha natthi,
atk-s0101a:563_10: Tato paraṃ nānussaratīti tato pubbenivāsā paraṃ na sarati,
atk-s0101a:563_11: sarituṃ asakkonto tattha ṭhatvā diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a:564_0: Niccotiādīsu tassa upapattiṃ apassanto niccoti vadati,
atk-s0101a:565_6: Hassakhiḍḍāratidhammasamāpannāti hassarati dhammañceva khiḍḍāratidhammañca samāpannā anuyuttā,
atk-s0101a:566_1: Te kira puññavisesādhigatena mahantena attano sirivibhavena nakkhattaṃ kīḷantā tāya sampattimahantatāya –
atk-s0101a:566_4: Atha ekāhārātikkamanato paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva,
atk-s0101a:566_10: Tesaṃ tejassa mandatāya karajakāyassa balavatāya sattāhampi atikkamitvā uṇhodakaacchayāguādīhi sakkā vatthuṃ upatthambhetuṃ.
atk-s0101a:566_13: Te ekaṃ āhāravelaṃ atikkamitvāva saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0101a:566_14: Yathā nāma gimhānaṃ majjhanhike tattapāsāṇe ṭhapitaṃ padumaṃ vā uppalaṃ vā sāyanhasamaye ghaṭasatenāpi siñciyamānaṃ pākatikaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0101a:566_16: Evameva pacchā nirantaraṃ khādantāpi pivantāpi cavantiyeva,
atk-s0101a:566_18: Tenāha “satiyā sammosā te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti.
atk-s0101a:566_22: karajaṃ manda”nti avisesena vuttattā pana ye keci kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvino devā evaṃ karonti,
atk-s0101a:567_4: nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmīti saparivāro rathena vīthiṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0101a:567_5: athañño nikkhamanto taṃ purato gacchantaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a:567_8: “pītiyā uddhumāto viya bhijjamāno viya ca gacchatī”ti kujjhati.
atk-s0101a:567_9: Purato gacchantopi nivattitvā taṃ kuddhaṃ disvā –
atk-s0101a:567_10: kuddhā nāma suviditā hontīti kuddhabhāvamassa ñatvā –
atk-s0101a:567_13: ayaṃ sampatti mayā dānasīlādīnaṃ vasena laddhā,
atk-s0101a:567_16: ubhosu pana kuddhesu ekassa kodho itarassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a:567_17: Tassapi kodho itarassa paccayo hotīti ubho kandantānaṃyeva orodhānaṃ cavanti.
atk-s0101a:568_2: cittaṃ pana yasmā purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa paccayaṃ datvāva nirujjhati,
atk-s0101a:568_3: tasmā cakkhādīnaṃ bhedato balavatarampi cittassa bhedaṃ na passati.
atk-s0101a:568_4: So taṃ apassanto yathā nāma sakuṇo ekaṃ rukkhaṃ jahitvā aññasmiṃ nilīyati,
atk-s0101a:568_5: evameva imasmiṃ attabhāve bhinne cittaṃ aññatra gacchatīti gahetvā evamāha.
atk-s0101a:570_2: antaṃ vā anantaṃ vā antānantaṃ vā nevantānānantaṃ vā ārabbha pavattavādāti attho.
atk-s0101a:571_1: Antasaññī lokasmiṃ viharatīti paṭibhāganimittaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ avaḍḍhetvā taṃ –
atk-s0101a:571_3: cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā vaḍḍhitakasiṇo pana anantasaññī hoti,
atk-s0101a:571_4: uddhamadho avaḍḍhetvā pana tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā uddhamadho antasaññī,
atk-s0101a:571_7: Ime cattāropi attanā diṭṭhapubbānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0101a:573_2: Evantipi me notiādinā nayena pariyantarahitā diṭṭhigatikassa diṭṭhi ceva vācā ca.
atk-s0101a:573_4: amarāya diṭṭhiyā vācāya ca vikkhepoti amarāvikkhepo,
atk-s0101a:573_8: sā ummujjananimujjanādivasena udake sandhāvamānā gahetuṃ na sakkāti,
atk-s0101a:573_9: evameva ayampi vādo itocito ca sandhāvati,
atk-s0101a:574_1: “Idaṃ kusala”nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti dasa kusalakammapathe yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti attho.
atk-s0101a:574_3: So mamassa vighātoti “musā mayā bhaṇita”nti vippaṭisāruppattiyā mama vighāto assa,
atk-s0101a:574_5: So mamassa antarāyoti so mama saggassa ceva maggassa ca antarāyo assa.
atk-s0101a:574_6: Musāvādabhayā musāvādaparijegucchāti musāvāde ottappena ceva hiriyā ca.
atk-s0101a:574_7: Vācāvikkhepaṃ āpajjatīti vācāya vikkhepaṃ āpajjati. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0101a:575_0: Evantipi me notiādīsu evantipi me noti aniyamitavikkhepo.
atk-s0101a:575_1: Tathātipi me noti “sassato attā ca loko cā”ti vuttaṃ sassatavādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a:575_2: Aññathātipi me noti sassatato aññathā vuttaṃ ekaccasassataṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a:575_4: “na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vuttaṃ ucchedaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a:575_5: No notipi me noti “neva hoti na na hotī”ti vuttaṃ takkīvādaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0101a:575_6: Sayaṃ pana “idaṃ kusala”nti vā “akusala”nti vā puṭṭho na kiñci byākaroti.
atk-s0101a:575_8: Tato “kiṃ akusala”nti vutte “tathātipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a:575_9: “Kiṃ ubhayato aññathā”ti vutte “aññathātipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a:575_11: kiṃ te laddhī”ti vutte “notipi me no”ti vadati.
atk-s0101a:575_12: Tato “kiṃ no noti te laddhī”ti vutte “no notipi me no”ti evaṃ vikkhepameva āpajjati,
atk-s0101a:576_1: Chando vā rāgo vāti ajānantopi sahasā kusalameva “kusala”nti vatvā akusalameva “akusala”nti vatvā mayā asukassa nāma evaṃ byākataṃ,
atk-s0101a:576_2: kiṃ taṃ subyākatanti aññe paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi –
atk-s0101a:576_6: akusalameva akusalanti byākata”nti vutte natthi mayā sadiso paṇḍitoti evaṃ me tattha chando vā rāgo vā assāti attho.
atk-s0101a:576_9: Doso vā paṭigho vāti kusalaṃ pana “akusala”nti,
atk-s0101a:576_10: akusalaṃ vā “kusala”nti vatvā aññe paṇḍite pucchitvā tehi –
atk-s0101a:576_11: “dubyākataṃ tayā”ti vutte ettakampi nāma na jānāmīti tattha me assa doso vā paṭigho vāti attho.
atk-s0101a:577_1: so mamassa vighātoti taṃ chandarāgadvayaṃ mama upādānaṃ assa,
atk-s0101a:577_5: Rāgo hi amuñcitukāmatāya ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāti jalūkā viya.
atk-s0101a:577_7: Ubhopi cete santāpakaṭṭhena vihananti yevāti “upādāna”nti ca “vighāto”ti ca vuttā.
atk-s0101a:578_3: Kataparappavādāti viññātaparappavādā ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicayā ca.
atk-s0101a:578_5: Te bhindantā maññeti vālavedhi viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigatāni attano paññāgatena bhindantā viya carantīti attho.
atk-s0101a:578_6: Te maṃ tatthāti te samaṇabrāhmaṇā maṃ tesu kusalākusalesu.
atk-s0101a:578_8: kiṃ akusalanti attano laddhiṃ vadā”ti laddhiṃ puccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a:578_9: Samanugāheyyunti “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “kena kāraṇena etamatthaṃ gāheyyu”nti kāraṇaṃ puccheyyuṃ.
atk-s0101a:578_10: Samanubhāseyyunti “iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte kāraṇe dosaṃ dassetvā “na tvaṃ idaṃ jānāsi,
atk-s0101a:578_15: So mamassa vighātoti yaṃ taṃ punappunaṃ vatvāpi asampāyanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0101a:579_5: Imepi cattāro pubbe pavattadhammānusāreneva diṭṭhiyā gahitattā pubbantakappikesu paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0101a:581_1: “Adhiccasamuppanno attā ca loko cā”ti dassanaṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ.
atk-s0101a:582_4: ekacco hi titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya –
atk-s0101a:582_6: citte sati hatthacchedādidukkhañceva sabbabhayāni ca honti,
atk-s0101a:582_9: evaṃ citte dosaṃ passitvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā asaññasattesu nibbattati,
atk-s0101a:582_12: Te tattha yathā nāma jiyāvegakkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego,
atk-s0101a:582_16: jhānavege pana parihīne tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati,
atk-s0101a:582_18: Yasmā pana tāya idha uppannasaññāya tesaṃ tattha cuti paññāyati,
atk-s0101a:582_19: tasmā “saññuppādā ca pana te devā tamhā kāyā cavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0101a:584_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhārasa pubbantakappike dassetvā idāni catucattārīsaṃ aparantakappike dassetuṃ – “santi,
atk-s0101a:584_3: Tattha anāgatakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ aparantaṃ kappetvā gaṇhantīti aparantakappikā,
atk-s0101a:587_1: Rūpī attātiādīsu kasiṇarūpaṃ “attā”ti tattha pavattasaññañcassa “saññā”ti gahetvā vā ājīvakādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “rūpī attā hoti,
atk-s0101a:587_2: arogo paraṃ maraṇā saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a:587_4: Arūpasamāpattinimittaṃ pana “attā”ti samāpattisaññañcassa “saññā”ti gahetvā vā nigaṇṭhādayo viya takkamatteneva vā “arūpī attā hoti,
atk-s0101a:587_5: arogo paraṃ maraṇā saññī”ti naṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a:587_13: Catutthacatukke pana dibbena cakkhunā tikacatukkajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattamānaṃ disvā “ekantasukhī”ti gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a:589_1: Asaññīvādo saññīvāde ādimhi vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:589_3: Kevalañhi tattha “saññī attā”ti gaṇhantānaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo,
atk-s0101a:591_8: Lābhī arahato dibbena cakkhunā cutiṃ disvā upapattiṃ apassanto,
atk-s0101a:591_12: Alābhī ca “ko paralokaṃ na jānātī”ti kāmasukhagiddhatāya vā.
atk-s0101a:591_13: “Yathā rukkhato paṇṇāni patitāni na puna viruhanti,
atk-s0101a:591_14: evameva sattā”tiādinā takkena vā ucchedaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0101a:591_15: Idha pana taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena tathā ca aññathā ca vikappetvāva imā satta diṭṭhiyo uppannāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a:595_1: Sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0101a:598_1: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpādīhi pañcahi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi bandhanehi vā.
atk-s0101a:598_4: Paricāretīti tesu kāmaguṇesu yathāsukhaṃ indriyāni cāreti sañcāreti itocito ca upaneti.
atk-s0101a:598_10: Evarūpe kāme upagatānañhi te diṭṭhadhammanibbānasampattiṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0101a:599_1: Dutiyavāre hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā,
atk-s0101a:599_3: Tesaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvāti tesaṃ kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmasaṅkhātā aññathābhāvā,
atk-s0101a:599_5: tampi me natthīti vuttanayena uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā.
atk-s0101a:600_3: Etenetanti etena vitakkitena ca vicāritena ca etaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ oḷārikaṃ sakaṇḍakaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0101a:601_3: Cetaso ābhogoti jhānā vuṭṭhāya tasmiṃ sukhe punappunaṃ cittassa ābhogo manasikāro samannāhāroti.
atk-s0101a:603_2: bhikkhave”ti iminā vārena sabbepi te aparantakappike ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vissajjeti. Puna – “imehi,
atk-s0101a:603_3: kho te bhikkhave”tiādinā vārena sabbepi te pubbantāparantakappike ekajjhaṃ niyyātetvā tadeva ñāṇaṃ vissajjeti.
atk-s0101a:603_6: dhammā”tiādimhi pucchamānopi sabbaññutaññāṇameva pucchitvā vissajjamānopi sattānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ tulāya
atk-s0101a:603_7: tulayanto viya sinerupādato vālukaṃ uddharanto viya dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni uddharitvā sabbaññutaññāṇameva
atk-s0101a:604_4: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0101a:604_13: ko antopūtibhāvo”ti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena pucchānusandhi veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:605_0: Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi –
atk-s0101a:605_1: “iti kira bho rūpaṃ anattā…, vedanā…, saññā…,
atk-s0101a:605_5: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā ceto parivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0101a:605_8: yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya –
atk-s0101a:605_14: Evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttasuttavasena ajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:606_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0101a:606_1: tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭipakkhavasena vā yesu suttesu upari desanā āgacchati,
atk-s0101a:606_12: Imasmimpi brahmajāle heṭṭhā diṭṭhivasena desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0101a:608_3: Tadapi tesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ajānataṃ apassataṃ vedayitaṃ taṇhāgatānaṃ paritassitavipphanditamevāti
atk-s0101a:608_4: yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena te somanassajātā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti
atk-s0101a:608_6: tadapi tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ ajānantānaṃ apassantānaṃ vedayitaṃ
atk-s0101a:608_9: Diṭṭhisaṅkhātena ceva taṇhāsaṅkhātena ca paritassitena vipphanditameva calitameva kampitameva thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇusadisaṃ,
atk-s0101a:610_2: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā”tiādi paramparapaccayadassanatthaṃ āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a:610_3: Tattha tadapi phassapaccayāti yena diṭṭhiassādena diṭṭhisukhena diṭṭhivedayitena te somanassajātā sassataṃ
atk-s0101a:611_1: Idāni tassa paccayassa diṭṭhivedayite balavabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna – “tatra,
atk-s0101a:611_4: Tattha te vata aññatra phassāti te vata samaṇabrāhmaṇā taṃ vedayitaṃ vinā phassena paṭisaṃvedissantīti kāraṇametaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0101a:611_5: Yathā hi patato gehassa upatthambhanatthāya thūṇā nāma balavapaccayo hoti,
atk-s0101a:611_6: na taṃ thūṇāya anupatthambhitaṃ ṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0101a:611_8: taṃ vinā idaṃ diṭṭhivedayitaṃ natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0101a:613_2: ye te samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti catūhi vatthūhi,
atk-s0101a:613_3: yepi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā ekaccasassatikātiādinā nayena sabbadiṭṭhivedayitāni sampiṇḍeti. Kasmā?
atk-s0101a:613_5: Sabbe te chahi phassāyatanehi phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti.
atk-s0101a:613_14: paṇṇattimattatthesu hi ayaṃ āyatanasaddo pavattati. Tattha –
atk-s0101a:613_23: Cakkhādīsu hi phassapañcamakā dhammā sañjāyanti samosaranti,
atk-s0101a:613_25: Idha pana “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0101a:613_26: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti iminā nayena phassasīseneva desanaṃ āropetvā phassaṃ ādiṃ katvā paccayaparamparaṃ dassetuṃ phassāyatanādīni vuttāni.
atk-s0101a:614_0: Phussa phussa paṭisaṃvedentīti phusitvā phusitvā paṭisaṃvedenti.
atk-s0101a:614_1: Ettha ca kiñcāpi āyatanānaṃ phusanakiccaṃ viya vuttaṃ,
atk-s0101a:614_6: tasmā sabbe te cha phassāyatanasambhavena phassena rūpādīni ārammaṇāni phusitvā taṃ diṭṭhivedanaṃ paṭisaṃvedayantīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:615_0: Tesaṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhātiādīsu vedanāti cha phassāyatanasambhavā vedanā.
atk-s0101a:615_1: Sā rūpataṇhādibhedāya taṇhāya upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a:615_4: Sā pana catubbidhassa upādānassa upanissayakoṭiyā ceva sahajātakoṭiyā ca paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a:616_1: jāti jarāmaraṇassa ceva sokādīnañca upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hoti.
atk-s0101a:616_11: atha ca pana paññāyati “idappaccayā avijjā”ti evaṃ avijjāsīsena vā, purimā,
atk-s0101a:616_18: Idha pana diṭṭhisīsena kathento vedanārāgena uppajjamānā diṭṭhiyo kathetvā vedanāmūlakaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0101a:616_21: idaṃ dassanaṃ gahetvā tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu
atk-s0101a:616_22: ito ettha etto idhāti sandhāvantā saṃsarantā yante yuttagoṇo viya,
atk-s0101a:616_24: vātena vippannaṭṭhanāvā viya ca vaṭṭadukkhameva anuparivattanti,
atk-s0101a:618_1: Evaṃ diṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni yuttayogabhikkhuadhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a:618_6: Channaṃ phassāyatanānanti yehi chahi phassāyatanehi phusitvā paṭisaṃvedayamānānaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vattati,
atk-s0101a:618_8: Samudayantiādīsu avijjāsamudayā cakkhusamudayotiādinā vedanākammaṭṭhāne vuttanayena phassāyatanānaṃ samudayādayo veditabbā.
atk-s0101a:618_9: Yathā pana tattha “phassasamudayā phassanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ, evamidha,
atk-s0101a:619_1: Ayaṃ pana diṭṭhiñca diṭṭhito ca uttaritaraṃ sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttinti yāva arahattā jānāti.
atk-s0101a:620_1: Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni “desanājālavimutto diṭṭhigatiko nāma natthī”ti dassanatthaṃ puna –
atk-s0101a:620_4: Tattha antojālīkatāti imassa mayhaṃ desanājālassa antoyeva katā.
atk-s0101a:620_5: Ettha sitā vāti etasmiṃ mama desanājāle sitā nissitā avasitāva.
atk-s0101a:620_7: Te adho osīdantāpi uddhaṃ uggacchantāpi mama desanājāle sitāva hutvā osīdanti ca uggacchanti ca.
atk-s0101a:620_8: Ettha pariyāpannāti ettha mayhaṃ desanājāle pariyāpannā,
atk-s0101a:620_9: etena ābaddhā antojālīkatā ca hutvā ummujjamānā ummujjanti,
atk-s0101a:620_10: na hettha asaṅgahito diṭṭhigatiko nāma atthīti.
atk-s0101a:621_5: Tassa tīre ṭhatvā olokentassa oḷārikānaṃ pāṇānaṃ antojālīkatabhāvadassanaṃ viya bhagavato sabbadiṭṭhigatānaṃ
atk-s0101a:622_1: Evaṃ imāhi dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīhi sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ saṅgahitattā sabbesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ etasmiṃ desanājāle
atk-s0101a:622_2: pariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano katthaci apariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassento –
atk-s0101a:622_9: Idha pana nettisadisatāya bhavataṇhā nettīti adhippetā.
atk-s0101a:622_10: Sā hi mahājanaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ neti upanetīti bhavanetti.
atk-s0101a:623_0: Kāyassa bhedā uddhanti kāyassa bhedato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0101a:623_4: Devā vā manussā vā na dakkhissanti,
atk-s0101a:624_4: rukkhe jātamahāvaṇṭo viya taṃ nissāya pubbe pavattataṇhā.
atk-s0101a:624_5: Tasmiṃ vaṇṭe upanibaddhā pañcapakkadvādasapakkaaṭṭhārasapakkaparimāṇā ambapiṇḍī viya taṇhāya sati taṇhūpanibandhanā
atk-s0101a:624_6: hutvā āyatiṃ nibbattanakā pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0101a:624_7: Yathā pana tasmiṃ vaṇṭe chinne sabbāni tāni ambāni tadanvayāni honti,
atk-s0101a:624_10: evameva ye bhavanettivaṇṭassa anupacchinnattā āyatiṃ uppajjeyyuṃ pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasadhātuyo,
atk-s0101a:624_11: sabbe te dhammā tadanvayā honti bhavanettiṃ anugatā,
atk-s0101a:625_0: Yathā pana tasmimpi rukkhe maṇḍūkakaṇṭakavisasamphassaṃ āgamma anupubbena sussitvā mate –
atk-s0101a:625_1: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne evarūpo nāma rukkho ahosī”ti vohāramattameva hoti,
atk-s0101a:625_3: evaṃ ariyamaggasamphassaṃ āgamma taṇhāsinehassa pariyādinnattā anupubbena sussitvā viya bhinne imasmiṃ kāye,
atk-s0101a:625_4: kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā na taṃ dakkhanti,
atk-s0101a:625_6: evarūpassa nāma kira satthuno idaṃ sāsananti vohāramattameva bhavissatīti anupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ pāpetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0101a:626_1: Evaṃ vutte āyasmā ānandoti evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ sutte vutte thero ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ suttaṃ samannāharitvā
atk-s0101a:626_2: evaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā kathitasuttassa na bhagavatā nāmaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0101a:626_3: handassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmīti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0101a:627_1: yasmā imasmiṃ dhammapariyāye idhatthopi paratthopi vibhatto,
atk-s0101a:627_2: tasmātiha tvaṃ imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ “atthajāla”ntipi naṃ dhārehi;
atk-s0101a:627_5: yasmā ca ettha seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0101a:627_9: yasmā pana imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā devaputtamārampi khandhamārampi maccumārampi kilesamārampi sakkā maddituṃ,
atk-s0101a:628_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva “anuttaro saṅgāmavijayotipi naṃ dhārehī”ti sakalaṃ
atk-s0101a:628_1: suttantaṃ bhagavā paresaṃ paññāya alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhaṃ paramagambhīraṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pakāsento sūriyo
atk-s0101a:629_1: Attamanā te bhikkhūti te bhikkhū attamanā sakamanā,
atk-s0101a:629_2: buddhagatāya pītiyā udaggacittā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0101a:629_3: Bhagavato bhāsitanti evaṃ vicitranayadesanāvilāsayuttaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena
atk-s0101a:629_4: paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena brahmassarena bhāsamānassa bhagavato vacanaṃ.
atk-s0101a:636_3: Tasmā dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu viniveṭhetvā desiyamānesu tassa tassa diṭṭhigatassa pariyosāne pariyosāneti dvāsaṭṭhiyā ṭhānesu akampitthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a:637_11: hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti evaṃ mahāparinibbāne āgatāya tantiyā vaṇṇanākāle vakkhāma.
atk-s0101a:637_12: Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha –
atk-s0101a:637_22: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe dvisahassadīpaparivāre cattāro mahādīpe pahāya pabbajitvā susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ
atk-s0101a:637_23: gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā katanti acchariyavegābhihatā akampittha.
atk-s0101a:637_27: Imasmiṃ pana brahmajāle dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu sādhukāradānavasena akampitthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0101a:638_0: Na kevalañca etesu ṭhānesuyeva pathavī akampittha,
atk-s0101a:638_1: atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha.
atk-s0101a:638_2: Kalyāṇiyavihāre ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ
atk-s0101a:638_3: gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0101a:638_6: tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampitthāti.
atk-s0101a:649_6: Aññepi ettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi?
atk-s0101a:649_8: Taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0101a:649_13: Tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharati ceva veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:649_14: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,
atk-s0101a:650_0: Jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti idamassa yaṃ gocaragāmaṃ upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0101a:650_2: rājagahe viharati jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavaneti rājagahasamīpe jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane viharatīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0101a:650_9: Jīvati bhaṇeti? Jīvati, devāti. Tena hi,
atk-s0101a:650_10: bhaṇe taṃ dārakaṃ amhākaṃ antepuraṃ netvā dhātīnaṃ detha posetunti.
